rules_text:
Improvise
When Survivor's Tale enters the battlefield, create a 1/2 white Drake creature token with flying or a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance, then draw a card.
special_text:
Improvise
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Create a 1/2 white Drake creature token with flying.
II – Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with Vigilance.
III – Draw a card.
